conbody.p: (d)(i) Submit proposed revisions to the FAR, DFARS or NMCARS to DASN(P) via the Deputy/Assistant Commander for Contracts of the cognizant HCA by email at Policy@navy.milwith the subject “DFARS 201.201-1 – Proposed [FAR/DFARS/NMCARS] Revision.” Each proposed revision should include a legal review and identify the name, code, and telephone number of the activity point of contact.
